NK040(thi)049:1: // gcod zab don gyis lhan thabs bsgrub thab dngos grub sgo 'byed kyis mchod 'bul bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)049:2: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la 'dud //
NK040(thi)049:3: mkha' 'gro'i mchod 'bum thugs dam bskang byed ni //
NK040(thi)049:4: sbyor ba dngos gzhi rjes gsum bstan par bya //
NK040(thi)049:5: sbyor ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos gsum ni //
NK040(thi)049:6: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed bsrung 'khor bsgom pa'o //
NK040(thi)049:7: skyobs 'gro dkon gsum mdun du bsam byas la //
NK040(thi)049:8: sgo gsum bag ldan gus gdung dad pa yis //
NK040(thi)049:9: sku gsum mngon gyur phyogs bcu dus gsum gyis //
NK040(thi)049:10: sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi //
NK040(thi)049:11: zhi ba 'dod chags kun dang bral ba yis //
NK040(thi)049:12: dam chos rnams la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi //
NK040(thi)049:13: ma nor lam mchog phyir mi ldog pa yis //
NK040(thi)049:14: dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi //
NK040(thi)049:15: smin cing grol mdzad rtsa ba brgyud pa yis //
NK040(thi)049:16: bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi //
NK040(thi)049:17: mchog thun dngos grub ma lus ster mdzad pa'i //
NK040(thi)049:18: yi dam rnams la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi //
NK040(thi)049:19: legs par byin rlabs phyi nang bar chad sel //
NK040(thi)049:20: mkha' 'gro rnams la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi //
NK040(thi)049:21: sangs rgyas bstan pa srung zhing dgra bo sgrol //
NK040(thi)049:22: chos skyong rnams la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi //
NK040(thi)049:23: gnyis pa 'gro ba'i don du sems bskyed pa ni /
NK040(thi)049:24: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dgongs su gsol //
NK040(thi)049:25: bdag ni rgyal sras rnams kyi rjes slob cing //
NK040(thi)049:26: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas ma thob bar //
NK040(thi)049:27: mkha' mnyam 'gro ba kun gyis don byed shog /
NK040(thi)049:28: kun gyi skyabs mgon dpal du bdag gyur cig /
NK040(thi)049:29: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal kun bsgral te //
NK040(thi)049:30: bde ba bla med byang chub mchog la 'god //
NK040(thi)049:31: de dag thams cad byang chub gyur pa la //
NK040(thi)049:32: mya ngan mi mda' chos 'khor bskor ba dang //
NK040(thi)049:33: dam chos bzung zhing brtan pa brtan par gyis //
NK040(thi)049:34: sangs rgyas kun gyi phrin las bdag bsgrub cing //
NK040(thi)049:35: de snyed yon tan ma lus rdzogs par bya'o //
NK040(thi)049:37: gsum pa bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya ba ste /
NK040(thi)049:39: las mkha' dbyings dag pa'i klong dkyil nas //
NK040(thi)049:40: rin chen sna tshogs rdo rje dbus mthing nag /
NK040(thi)049:41: shar dkar lho ser nub dmar byang ljang khu //
NK040(thi)049:42: rgya gram mtha' yas rdo rje'i sa gzhir gyur //
NK040(thi)049:43: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar pad nyi'i steng //
NK040(thi)049:45: bsam 'od 'phros rdo rje'i rwa ba dang //
NK040(thi)049:46: ri bo lta bur brtan cing yangs pa yis //
NK040(thi)049:47: rdo rje yang pa'i gur khang chen por gyur //
NK040(thi)049:48: ramh zhes brjod pas phyi rol rnams //
NK040(thi)049:49: 'ur 'ur tshig tshig ye shes me chen 'bar //
NK040(thi)049:50: kha dog sna tshogs bdud dpung nges par bsreg /
NK040(thi)049:51: sa gzhi me dpung 'bar ba'i gur khang gyur //
NK040(thi)049:52: de dbus pad nyi'i steng du h'u las ni //
NK040(thi)049:53: rin chen sa gzhi las grub sra brtan zhing //
NK040(thi)049:54: yangs zhing rgya che 'khor lo rtsib stong bar //
NK040(thi)049:55: dgra bgegs phye mar brlag zhing 'khor ba'i tshul //
NK040(thi)049:56: rtsib stong nang du h'u stong 'phros pa las //
NK040(thi)049:57: sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las kyis //
NK040(thi)049:58: mkha' 'gro gyur pas phyogs bcur ma lus khyab //
NK040(thi)049:59: 'jigs gzugs can gyis sku mdog sna tshogs pa //
NK040(thi)049:60: zhal gdangs mtshe gcig spyan gsum glog ltar 'khyug /
NK040(thi)049:61: dur khrod chas brgyad sku la me dpung 'bar //
NK040(thi)049:62: phyag mtshan sna tshogs rab tu gdeng pa yis //
NK040(thi)049:63: dgra bgegs 'byung po gnod byed ma lus pa //
NK040(thi)049:64: rgyal 'bog sngang zhing rab tu zhi bar byed /
NK040(thi)049:65: badz+ra rak+sha rak+sha h'u h'u s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)049:66: dngos gzhi rgyal ba mnyes byed yan lag bdun //
NK040(thi)049:67: dam tshig bskyed dang ye shes spyan drangs bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:68: phyi nang gsang mchod bstod pa bya ba dang /
NK040(thi)049:69: tshogs gtor 'bul dang bskyed rdzogs ngang la gnas /
NK040(thi)049:70: dang po sems bskyed rgyal ba mnyes byed ni /
NK040(thi)049:71: phyi snod 'jig rten khams ni gzhal yas khang //
NK040(thi)049:72: nang bcud sems can lha dang lha mor gsal //
NK040(thi)049:73: rang lus lha bskyed rgyal ba'i da la ru //
NK040(thi)049:74: ye nas lhun grub gzhal yang khang gi dbus //
NK040(thi)049:75: dbus dang phyogs bzhir zla pad ro'i steng //
NK040(thi)049:76: ngo bo bla ma ma cig lab sgron ni //
NK040(thi)049:77: rnam pa rdo rje phag mo sku mdog mthing //
NK040(thi)049:78: zhal cig zhi khro spyan gsum dbu skra grol //
NK040(thi)049:79: phyag g.yas cang te'u g.yon pas thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:80: kha t+w+aam rtse gsum mchan khung g.yon na 'gying //
NK040(thi)049:81: rin chen rus pa dur khrod chas kyi brgyan //
NK040(thi)049:82: gar dgu'i nyams ldan zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:83: shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro sku mdog dkar //
NK040(thi)049:84: phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon pas thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:85: zhal gcig zhi khro spyan gsum dbu skra grol //
NK040(thi)049:86: kha t+w+aam rtse gsum mchan khung g.yon na 'gying //
NK040(thi)049:87: rin chen rus pa dur khrod chas kyi brgyan //
NK040(thi)049:88: gar dgu'i nyams ldan zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:89: lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro sku mdog ser //
NK040(thi)049:90: phyag g.yas rin chen g.yon pa thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:91: zhal gcig zhi khro spyan gsum dbu skra grol //
NK040(thi)049:92: kha t+w+aam rtse gsum mchan khung g.yon na 'gying //
NK040(thi)049:93: rin chen rus pa dur khrod chas kyis brgyan //
NK040(thi)049:94: gar dgu'i nyams ldan zhabs gnyis brkyang brkum bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:95: nub tu pad+ma mkha' 'gro sku mdog dmar //
NK040(thi)049:96: phyag g.yas pad+ma g.yon pas thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:97: zhal gcig zhi khro spyan gsum dbu skra grol //
NK040(thi)049:98: kha t+w+aam rtse gsum mchan khung g.yon na 'gying //
NK040(thi)049:99: rin chen rus pa dur khrod chas kyis brgyan //
NK040(thi)049:100: gar dgu'i nyams ldan zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:101: byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro sku mdog ljang //
NK040(thi)049:102: phyag gnyis ral gri g.yon pas thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:103: zhal gcig zhi khro spyan gsum dbu skra grol //
NK040(thi)049:104: kha t+w+aam rtse gsum mchan khung g.yon na 'gying //
NK040(thi)049:105: rin chen rus pa dur khrod chas kyis brgyan //
NK040(thi)049:106: gar dgu'i nyams ldan zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:107: rang rang 'khor gyis sa gzhi gang bar bsam //
NK040(thi)049:109: gnyis pa spyan 'dren rgyal mnyes byed ni /
NK040(thi)049:110: chos dbyings rnam dag pho brang nas //
NK040(thi)049:111: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis //
NK040(thi)049:112: sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las kyi //
NK040(thi)049:113: bdag nyid chen mo ma cig lab sgron ni //
NK040(thi)049:114: phag mor sku bzhengs rigs bzhir mkha' 'gros bskor //
NK040(thi)049:115: dpa' bos bro brdung phata skad sangs se sang //
NK040(thi)049:116: dpa' mos gar byed h'u glu kyu ru ru //
NK040(thi)049:117: rin chen rus brgyan sgra snyan khro lo lo //
NK040(thi)049:118: gnas mchog 'di rus spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)049:119: bsgrub mchog bdag la dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)049:120: mi mthun rkyen dang bar chad bzlog tu gsol //
NK040(thi)049:121: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK040(thi)049:122: me long ye shes dag pa'i da la nas //
NK040(thi)049:123: zhi ba'i las mdzad rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni //
NK040(thi)049:124: rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro yongs kyis bskor //
NK040(thi)049:125: dpa' bos broo brdung phata skad sangs se sang //
NK040(thi)049:126: dpa' mos gar byed h'u glu kyu ru ru //
NK040(thi)049:127: rin chen brgyan cha sgra skad khro lo lo //
NK040(thi)049:128: gnas mchog 'di ru spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol //
NK040(thi)049:129: bsgrub mchog bdag la dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)049:130: mi mthun rkyen dang bar chad bzlog tu gsol //
NK040(thi)049:131: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK040(thi)049:132: mnyam nyid ye shes dag pa'i da la nas //
NK040(thi)049:133: rgyas pa'i las mdzad rin chen mkha' 'gro ni //
NK040(thi)049:134: rin chen rigs kyi lha tshogs yongs kyi bskor //
NK040(thi)049:135: dpa' bos bro brdung phata skad sangs se sang //
NK040(thi)049:136: dpa' mos gar byed h'u glu kyu ru ru //
NK040(thi)049:137: rin chen rus rgyan sgra snyan khro lo lo //
NK040(thi)049:138: gnas mchog 'di ru spyan 'dren bsgrub mchog bdag la
NK040(thi)049:139: mi mthun rkyen dang bar chad mchog dang thun mong
NK040(thi)049:140: sor rtog ye shes dag pa'i da la ru //
NK040(thi)049:141: dbang gi las mdzad pad+ma mkha' 'gro ni //
NK040(thi)049:142: pad+ma rigs kyi lha tshogs dpa' bo'i bro brdung phata
NK040(thi)049:143: skad dpa' mos gar byed h'u rin chen rus brgyan
NK040(thi)049:144: sgra gnas mchog 'di bsgrub mchog bdag mi mthun rkyen
NK040(thi)049:145: dang bar chad mchog dang thun mong bya grub ye
NK040(thi)049:146: shes dag pa'i da la nas //
NK040(thi)049:147: drag po'i las mdzad las kyi rigs kyi lha tshogs
NK040(thi)049:148: yongs dpa' bo bro brdung phata skad dpa' mo'i gar
NK040(thi)049:149: byed h'u rin chen rus brgyan sgra gnas mchog 'di
NK040(thi)049:150: ru bsgrub mchog bdag la mi mthun rkyen dang bar
NK040(thi)049:151: cha da sol // mchog dang thun mong dngos grub skul //
NK040(thi)049:152: badz+ra sa ma ya dza dzah gsum pa bzhugs gsol rgyal ba mnyes byed ni /
NK040(thi)049:153: gzugs tshor la sogs phung po rnam lnga ni //
NK040(thi)049:154: ye nas lhun grub rgyal ba'i da la ru //
NK040(thi)049:155: nyon mongs skyon bral nyi zla'i da ro'i steng //
NK040(thi)049:156: sku lnga rab rdzogs bla ma lab sgron bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:157: ye shes lnga ldan yi dam lab sgron bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:158: phrin las bzhi mdzad mkha' 'gro lab sgron bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:159: rang byung sprul sku gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)049:160: bdag sogs lus ngag yid gsum byin rlobs cing //
NK040(thi)049:161: 'gro ba'i don du gnyis med brtan par bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:162: phrin las rnam bzhi myur du 'grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)049:163: rnam shes phung po dag pa'i da la ru //
NK040(thi)049:164: nyon mongs skyon bral nyi zla pad ro'i steng //
NK040(thi)049:165: gar dgu'i nyams ldan me long ye shes can //
NK040(thi)049:166: rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas ma lus pa //
NK040(thi)049:167: 'gro ba'i don phyir gnyis med brtan par bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:168: mi mthun gnod pa'i rkyen rnams zhi bar mdzod //
NK040(thi)049:169: tshor ba'i phung po dag pa'i da la ru //
NK040(thi)049:170: nyon mongs skyon bral nyi zla pad ro'i steng //
NK040(thi)049:171: gar dgu'i nyams ldan mnyam nyid ye shes can //
NK040(thi)049:172: rin chen mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas ma lus pa //
NK040(thi)049:173: 'gro ba'i don du gnyis med brtan par bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:174: shes rab tshe dbang longs spyod rgyas par mdzod //
NK040(thi)049:175: 'du shes phung po dag pa'i da la ru //
NK040(thi)049:176: nyon mongs skyon bral nyi zla pad ro'i steng //
NK040(thi)049:177: gar dgu'i nyams ldan sor rtog ye shes can //
NK040(thi)049:178: pad+ma mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas ma lus pa //
NK040(thi)049:179: 'gro ba'i don phyir gnyis med brtan par bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:180: khams gsum ma lus bdag gi dbang du bsdud //
NK040(thi)049:181: 'du byed phung po dag pa'i da la ru //
NK040(thi)049:182: nyon mongs skyon bral nyi zla pad ro'i steng //
NK040(thi)049:183: gar dgu'i nyams ldan bya grub ye shes can //
NK040(thi)049:184: karma mkha' 'gro bcas ma lus pa //
NK040(thi)049:185: 'gro ba'i don phyir gnyis med brtan par bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:186: drag po'i las rnams myur du 'grub par mdzod //
NK040(thi)049:188: bzhi pa mchod pa rgyal ba mnyes byed ni //
NK040(thi)049:189: mchod pa'i bye brag ji snyed ma lus pa /
NK040(thi)049:191: kun bzang bla med mchod sprin chen por bsam /
NK040(thi)049:192: rab 'byams 'jig rten khams 'di dpag med na //
NK040(thi)049:193: me tog bdug spos mar me dri chab dang //
NK040(thi)049:194: zhal zas rol mo sgra snyan mchod sprin rnams //
NK040(thi)049:195: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la 'bul //
NK040(thi)049:196: thugs rje 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)049:197: bdag sogs 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyis //
NK040(thi)049:198: tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas sku gnyis myur thob shog /
NK040(thi)049:199: rab 'byams 'jig rten khams 'di 'khor lo nor bu btsun mo blon po dang //
NK040(thi)049:200: glang po rta mchog dmag dpon rin chen rnams //
NK040(thi)049:201: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i thugs rjes 'gro ba'i
NK040(thi)049:202: don du bdag sogs 'gro ba sems can tshogs gnyis
NK040(thi)049:203: rdzogs nas rab 'byams 'jig rten sgeg mo 'phreng ba
NK040(thi)049:205: me tog bdug spos mar me dri'i lha //
NK040(thi)049:206: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la thugs rje
NK040(thi)049:207: 'gro ba'i bdag sogs 'gro ba tshogs gnyis rdzogs rab
NK040(thi)049:208: 'byams 'jig rten gter chen bum pa nyi zla rgya
NK040(thi)049:209: chen gdug / ri rab ri bdun gling bzhi gling phran rnams //
NK040(thi)049:210: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i thugs rje 'gro ba'i
NK040(thi)049:211: don du bdag sogs 'gro ba tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas
NK040(thi)049:212: rab 'byams 'jig rten gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya
NK040(thi)049:213: chos la sogs // sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga dang sman raka sogs //
NK040(thi)049:214: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la 'bul //
NK040(thi)049:215: thugs rje 'gro ba'i don bdag sogs 'gro ba tshogs
NK040(thi)049:216: gnyis rdzogs rab 'byams 'jig rten khams 'di dpag med
NK040(thi)049:217: na // bde ba chen po yang dag mnyam sbyor bzhis //
NK040(thi)049:218: gnyis med chu bo'i thig le chen po 'di //
NK040(thi)049:219: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la thugs rje
NK040(thi)049:220: 'gro ba'i don la bdag sogs 'gro ba tshogs gnyis
NK040(thi)049:221: rab 'byams 'jig rten phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas
NK040(thi)049:222: ji snyed rnams // bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i drung //
NK040(thi)049:223: kun bzang mchod sprin rgyun mi chad gyur cig /
NK040(thi)049:224: +aahmh'u p+au tsa hoh lnga pa bstod pa rgyal ba mnyes byed ni /
NK040(thi)049:225: yon tan mi zad rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi bstod /
NK040(thi)049:226: skye med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang //
NK040(thi)049:227: 'gags med longs sku mtshan dpe rab tu brgyan //
NK040(thi)049:228: gnyis med sprul sku 'gro ba 'dul ba yis //
NK040(thi)049:229: sku gsum lhun grub ma cig lab sgron ni //
NK040(thi)049:230: bdud bzhi 'jom mdzad zhal gdang mche ba gtsig /
NK040(thi)049:231: dus gsum gzigs phyir spyan gsum phyogs bcur gzigs //
NK040(thi)049:232: gzugs mdzes gzi brjid dbu skra lcang lo khrol //
NK040(thi)049:233: khams gsum dbang sdud spyi gtsug phag zhal ngur //
NK040(thi)049:234: chos kyi sgra sgrog g.yas pa cang ti'u 'khrol //
NK040(thi)049:235: dngos grub ster phyir phyag g.yon thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:236: thabs shes zung 'jug kha t+w+aam mchan khung g.yon //
NK040(thi)049:237: rtag chad mtha' 'das zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:238: pha rol phyin rdzogs rin chen rus pas brgyan //
NK040(thi)049:239: yon tan rab rdzogs gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)049:240: rdo rje phag mo'i sku dang gnyis su med //
NK040(thi)049:241: ma cig lab sgron sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)049:242: khams gsum zil gnon nyi zla pad ro'i steng //
NK040(thi)049:243: zhe sdang dag pa me long ye shes can //
NK040(thi)049:244: rnam shes gnas dag rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni //
NK040(thi)049:245: zhi ba'i las mdzad sku mdog dkar mor sprul //
NK040(thi)049:246: bdud bzhi 'jom mdzad zhal gdangs mche ba gtsig /
NK040(thi)049:247: dus gsum gzigs phyir spyan gsum phyogs bcur gzigs //
NK040(thi)049:248: gzugs mdzes gzi brjid dbu skra lcang lo khrol //
NK040(thi)049:249: stong nyid mtshon phyir phyag g.yas rdo rje bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:250: dngos grub ster phyir phyag g.yon thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:251: thabs shes zung 'jug kha t+w+aam mchan khung g.yon //
NK040(thi)049:252: rtag chad mtha' spong zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:253: pha rol phyin rdzogs rin chen rus pas brgyan //
NK040(thi)049:254: yon tan rab rdzogs gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)049:255: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)049:256: khams gsum zil gnon nyi zla pad ro'i steng //
NK040(thi)049:257: nga rgyal dag pa mnyam nyid ye shes can //
NK040(thi)049:258: tshor ba'i gnas dag rin chen mkha' 'gro ni //
NK040(thi)049:259: rgyas pa'i las mdzad sku mdog ser mor bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:260: bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad zhal gdangs mche ba gtsig /
NK040(thi)049:261: dus gsum gzigs phyir spyan gsum phyogs bcur gzigs //
NK040(thi)049:262: gzugs mdzes gzi brjid dbu skra lcang lo khrol //
NK040(thi)049:263: yon tan rgyas phyir phyag g.yas nor bu bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:264: dngos grub ster phyir phyag g.yon thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:265: thabs shes zung 'jug kha t+w+aam mchan khung g.yon //
NK040(thi)049:266: rtag chad mtha' spong zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:267: pha rol phyin rdzogs rin chen rus pas brgyan //
NK040(thi)049:268: yon tan rab rdzogs gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)049:269: rin chen mkha' 'gro'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)049:270: khams gsum zil gnon nyi zla pad ro'i steng //
NK040(thi)049:271: 'dod chags dag pa kun rtogs ye shes can //
NK040(thi)049:272: 'du shes gnas dag pad+ma mkha' 'gro ni //
NK040(thi)049:273: dbang gi las mdzad sku mdog dmar mor bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:274: bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad zhal gdangs mche ba gtsig /
NK040(thi)049:275: dus gsum gzigs phyir spyan gsum phyogs bcur gzigs //
NK040(thi)049:276: gzugs mdzes gzi brjid dbu skra lcang lo khrol //
NK040(thi)049:277: 'khor bar ma gos phyag g.yas pad+ma bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:278: dngos grub ster phyir phyag g.yon thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:279: thabs shes zung 'jug kha t+w+aam mchan khung g.yon //
NK040(thi)049:280: rtag chad mtha' spong zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:281: pha rol phyin bcus rin chen rus brgyan spras //
NK040(thi)049:282: yon tan rab rdzogs gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)049:283: pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)049:284: khams gsum zil gnon nyi zla pad ro'i steng //
NK040(thi)049:285: phrag dog dag pa bya grub ye shes can //
NK040(thi)049:286: 'du byed gnas dag karma mkha' 'gro ni //
NK040(thi)049:287: drag po'i las mdzad sku mdog ljang gur sprul //
NK040(thi)049:288: bdud bzhir 'joms mdzad zhal gdangs mche ba gtsig /
NK040(thi)049:289: dus gsum gzigs phyir spyan gsum phyogs bcur gzigs //
NK040(thi)049:290: gzugs mdzes gzi brjid dbu skra lcang lo khrol //
NK040(thi)049:291: nyon mongs gcod mdzad phyag g.yas ral gri bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:292: dngos grub ster phyir phyag g.yon thod khrag bsnams //
NK040(thi)049:293: thabs shes zung 'jug kha t+w+aam mchan khung g.yon //
NK040(thi)049:294: rtags chad mtha' spong zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
NK040(thi)049:295: pha rol phyin rdzogs rin chen rus pas brgyan //
NK040(thi)049:296: yon tan rab rdzogs gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)049:297: karma mkha' 'gro'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)049:298: rigs bzhi'i 'khor ni phrin las bzhi bsgrub pa'i //
NK040(thi)049:299: ma mo mkha' 'gro bye ba'i tshogs kyis bskor //
NK040(thi)049:300: rang rang sku mdog phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa //
NK040(thi)049:301: mthu dang rdzu 'phrul dpag med ldan pa yi //
NK040(thi)049:302: rnal 'byor phrin las rnam bzhi myur bsgrub pa'i //
NK040(thi)049:303: ma mo mkha' 'gro rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)049:305: drug pa tshogs gtor rgyal ba mnyes byed ni //
NK040(thi)049:306: bdud rtsi tshogs gtor byin brlab ste //
NK040(thi)049:307: sha zan chang sogs gtor ma mdun du bsham //
NK040(thi)049:308: rang nyid yi dam lhar gsal thugs ka nas //
NK040(thi)049:309: yam 'phros yam las rlung byung bag chags gtor //
NK040(thi)049:310: ram 'phros ram las me byung bag chags sreg /
NK040(thi)049:311: kham 'phros kham las chu byung gnyis 'dzin bkrus //
NK040(thi)049:313: las 'od 'phros yangs chen snod du gyur //
NK040(thi)049:315: h'u las 'od 'phros ye shes bdud rtsir gyur //
NK040(thi)049:317: theb srin dkon mchog rtsa ba gsum sogs mchod //
NK040(thi)049:318: tshogs phud gtor mar bran la phul ba ni //
NK040(thi)049:319: ri rab gling bzhi gling phran ltar //
NK040(thi)049:320: rgya chen bkod legs brjid pa'i tshogs gtor 'di //
NK040(thi)049:321: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la 'bul //
NK040(thi)049:322: rtsa ba gsum gyis thugs dam bskang gyur cig /
NK040(thi)049:323: rnal 'byor nyes ltung sgrib gnyis mthol lo bshags //
NK040(thi)049:324: mchog dang thun mongs dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK040(thi)049:325: sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig pa dang //
NK040(thi)049:326: rnal 'byor bdag la sdang ba yis //
NK040(thi)049:327: dgra bo'i sha khrag la kha ram kha hi //
NK040(thi)049:328: rgya mtshor nor bu nyi zla gza' skar ltar //
NK040(thi)049:329: zag med gsal mdangs rgyas pa'i gtor ma 'di //
NK040(thi)049:330: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la 'bul //
NK040(thi)049:331: rtsa ba gsum gyi thugs dam bskang rnal 'byor nyes ltung sgrib gnyis mthol lo bshags //
NK040(thi)049:332: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK040(thi)049:333: sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig pa dang //
NK040(thi)049:334: rnal 'byor bdag la sdang ba yis //
NK040(thi)049:335: dgra bo'i sha khrag kha ram kha hi //
NK040(thi)049:336: gzugs sdug sgra snyan dri zhim ro brgya ldan //
NK040(thi)049:337: reg 'jam 'dod yon lnga ldan tshogs gtor 'di //
NK040(thi)049:338: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la 'bul //
NK040(thi)049:339: rtsa ba gsum gyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig /
NK040(thi)049:340: rnal 'byor nyes ltung sgrib gnyis mthol lo bshags //
NK040(thi)049:341: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK040(thi)049:342: sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig pa dang //
NK040(thi)049:343: rnal 'byor bdag la sdang ba yi //
NK040(thi)049:344: dgra bo'i sha khrag la kha ram kha hi //
NK040(thi)049:345: sha khrag bdud rtsi lnga dang sman rag sogs //
NK040(thi)049:346: rab 'byams 'jig rten khams kyi mchod 'os rnams //
NK040(thi)049:347: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la 'bul //
NK040(thi)049:348: rtsa ba gsum gyis thugs dam bskang gyur cig /
NK040(thi)049:349: rnal 'byor nyes ltung sgrib gnyis mthol lo bshags //
NK040(thi)049:350: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub brtsal du gsol //
NK040(thi)049:351: sangs rgyas bstan pa bshigs pa dang //
NK040(thi)049:352: rnal 'byor bdag la sdang ba yis //
NK040(thi)049:353: dgra bo'i sha khrag la kha ram kha hi //
NK040(thi)049:354: +aahmh'u ma h+aa pu tsa kha hi /
NK040(thi)049:355: de nas dam tshig drangs la tshogs la rol /
NK040(thi)049:357: bdun pa bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug rnal 'byor ni /
NK040(thi)049:358: snang srid 'khor 'das ma lus rang gi sems //
NK040(thi)049:359: sems nyid spros bral skye med chos skur rdzogs //
NK040(thi)049:360: skye med 'gags med gzugs sku bskyed rims sogs //
NK040(thi)049:361: bskyed dang rdzogs pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ngang //
NK040(thi)049:362: gnyis med ngang nas spyod lam rnam bzhi skyongs //
NK040(thi)049:363: rjes su bkra shis bsngo ba smon lam ni /
NK040(thi)049:364: bkra shis tshogs pa rnams kyi mthun pa ru //
NK040(thi)049:365: spyi dang mthun pa'i bkra shis brjod par bya /
NK040(thi)049:366: bsngo ba smon lam dmigs med ngang las ni /
NK040(thi)049:367: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dgongs su gsol //
NK040(thi)049:368: bdag gis dus gsum bsags pa'i dge ba ma lus rnams //
NK040(thi)049:369: mkha' mnyam sems can don du byang chub chen por bsngo //
NK040(thi)049:370: dge ba 'di yi 'gro kun rnam mkhyen myur thob shog /
NK040(thi)049:371: tshe rab kun tu dal 'byor ldan pa dang //
NK040(thi)049:372: rgyal sras bla ma yi dam mnyes byed cing //
NK040(thi)049:373: de dag rnams kyis rjes su slob pa dang //
NK040(thi)049:374: 'phags mchog rnams kyi dgongs pa bla med yongs rdzogs shog /
NK040(thi)049:375: mkha' 'gro'i mchod 'bum thugs dam bskang byed zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
NK040(thi)049:376: bya bral ba kun dga' 'bum gyis bris pa rdzogs so ////
